document_data.name: House of Pride
document_data.mainbody: '''House of Pride''' was a [[perfume]] shop in the city of [[Waterdeep]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref>
document_data.Location: This store was located in Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]],
document_data.Structure: This building stood one-story tall. A special [[enchantment]] placed over the store prevented its glass goods from shattering or falling apart by any means, though they could still be vaporized or melted.
document_data.Services: The House of Pride was well stocked, selling a wide variety of perfumes and exotic scents sourced from all across [[Faer√ªn]], including the burnt ashes of a [[snowsnake]] and the musk of female [[giant slug]]s. All contained within glass bottles of various sizes, shapes, and hues.
document_data.Inhabitants: The store was guarded by a group of trained, fiercely-loyal hunting [[dog]]s that all sported compact builds.
document_data.Reputation: The House of Pride was among some of the more notable and recognizable shops in the Dock Ward.
